patient_info: Compulsive behaviors,Delayed speech and language development,Poor suck,Postnatal growth retardation,Infantile muscular hypotonia
golden_diagnosis: Prader-Willi 综合征/Prader-Willi syndrome; PWS/Prader-Willi syndrome/Prader-Willi syndrome,Prader-Willi 综合征/Prader-Willi syndrome; PWS/Prader-Willi syndrome/Prader-Willi syndrome,Prader-Willi 综合征/Prader-Willi syndrome; PWS/Prader-Willi syndrome/Prader-Willi syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Prader-Willi syndrome (PWS)
2. Down syndrome
3. Non-syndromic intellectual disability
4. Congenital adrenal hyperplasia (7α,22 hydroxylase deficiency, 17α,20 lyase deficiency, 11α,17α-hydroxylase/17β-dehydrogenase deficiency, and 3β-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase deficiency)
5. Lymphocytic adrenal hyperplasia
6. Adrenal hypoplasia
7. Severe childhood protein-energy malnutrition
8. Neonatal intramuscular adenovirus infection
9. Congenital diaphragmatic hernia
10. Birth defects due to alcohol exposure during pregnancy
